Title: Lies I Told My Little Sister
Writer: Jonathan Weisbrod, Jonathan Weisbrod, Judy White
Actors: Lucy Walters, Ellen Foley, Donovan Patton, Alicia Minshew
Plot: After the death of her oldest sister, a 30 year old globe-trotting nature photographer is guilted onto a family trip to Cape Cod - along with the younger sister she used to torment. Amid ...
